title: Cheesy tomato and bacon pasta bake
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon sunflower oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 tin tomato soup', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon garlic puree', '4 rashers unsmoked back bacon, chopped', '50g (2 oz) cheddar, grated', '1 tablespoons grated parmesan', 'salt and pepper to season', '500g pasta']
